content: Is there interest in participating in a Consumer Centered Data Exchange track at the upcoming Connectathon? This would start with the previous tracks that were focused on consent (using either Consent and/or OAuth). Might add Accounting-of-Disclosures, or tracking of Provenance for re-disclosure control, or other features the community is interested in. See http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=January_2018_New_Orleans_CCDE_Connectathon_Track_2
